title: Baked Salmon Pasta
ingredients: ['675g skinned salmon fillet, cut into 10cm pieces', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, crushed', 'salt to taste', '1 teaspoon dried thyme leaves', '350g egg noodles', '30g salted butter', '1/2 cup chopped fresh sage', '2 cloves crushed garlic', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '300g frozen peas, thawed', '1 lime, juiced', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 lime, juiced']
